system.description:
Despite your fury, you know exactly how to make the best use of magical equipment: more violence, of course. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Constitution, or Intelligence increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your artificer levels count as berserker levels for the purpose of determining how often you can rage.
  • While you are raging, your attacks deal additional force damage equal to the number of magic items you are attuned to.
  • While you are raging, if you score a critical hit on a creature of the Construct type, it is stunned until the end of its next turn.
  • You gain an additional Grinding Cog maneuver. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
